medium: Cotton, silk, gold colored tape, metal sequins
title: Jacket
description: lined black jacket with deep side vents; heavily decorated on three edges with embroidery, applique, sequins and metal tape (absent on PL front vent); front edges trimmed with woven black and brown tape and colored embroidery; three short cloth ties; yoke, neck back and sleeve tops heavily embroidered in multicolors, sequins and metal tape
